alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 10:52AM CDT until May 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Hardin. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Illinois River Valley City 14.0 13.9 13.9 13.9 13.9 13.8 13.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
